---
title: "Evaluation Results"
format: html
---

<div id="results-table"></div>

```{=html}
<script>
// 1) Carga el JSON
fetch("/_data/run_20250626_120752.json")
  .then(r => r.json())
  .then(data => {
    // 2) Construye la tabla
    const cols = [
      "timestamp","model_name","training_dataset","inference_dataset",
      "fine_tuned_icao","OFIQ_score","ICAO_compliance",
      "bpp","watermark_lenght","accuracy","psnr","ssim"
    ];
    let html = "<table class='table table-striped table-hover'><thead><tr>"
      + cols.map(c => `<th>${c}</th>`).join("") +
      "</tr></thead><tbody>";
    for (let row of data) {
      html += "<tr>" + cols.map(c=>{
        let v = row[c] ?? "";
        return `<td>${v}</td>`;
      }).join("") + "</tr>";
    }
    html += "</tbody></table>";
    document.getElementById("results-table").innerHTML = html;
  })
  .catch(e => {
    document.getElementById("results-table")
      .innerHTML = `<p style="color:red">Error cargando datos: ${e}</p>`;
  });
</script>
